thread.title: Barebrush.com Announces Curators' Choice Awards for October 2015
thread.title_full: Barebrush.com Announces Curators' Choice Awards for October 2015

author: prbuzz.com
title: Barebrush.com Announces Curators' Choice Awards for October 2015
text:
Barebrush.com Announces Curators' Choice Awards for October 2015
New York, NY. - Barebrush.com announces the winners of the October 2015 competitions. Grand prize winner is Jean Marcellino, whose Amanda Emergent is on the front page of barebrush.com for the month of November.
Nominees for the N*de-of-the-Month were selected as Curators' Choice by the guest curator, D.S. Wade, Curator & Artist. All Barebrush curators have an opportunity to rank the Curators' Choice in their own special poll. Results are officially announced on the 20th of the month.
Art of the Nude
Award: Curators' Choice 1st Place: N*de-of-the-Month, October 2015
Title and Artist: Amanda Emergent by Jean Marcellino of New York, NY
Words of the Artist: This charcoal drawing was done in 2007 at the Art Student's League in Ephraim Rubenstein's class. It was an honor to see it
Media: Charcoal/carbon
Award: Curators' Choice 2nd Place
Title and Artist: White KImono by Christian Beels of New York, NY
Words of the Artist: Working with a model I had hired while working at an arts camp in the Catskills in the 1970s, it suddenly occurred to me that
Media: Pastel
Award: Curators' Choice 3rd Place
Title and Artist: Sexuality by Ed Hicks of Hazlet, NJ
Words of the Artist: Original oil painting on gallery wrap canvas
Media: Oil
About Barebrush.com
Barebrush shows contemporary art of all genres, media and styles in three online, monthly art exhibitions. Guest curators select the Curators Choice nominees, looking for meaning, emotional impact and skill. Barebrush helps worthy artists win recognition and prizes.
The mission of Barebrush is to increase the awareness, acceptance and appreciation of the art of the nude. Online since 2006.
